CustomField.description: This field tells you if the account is a Wall Builder Customer of any kind.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Wall_Builder__c, "Own It"), ISPICKVAL(Wall_Builder__c, "Own Partial"), ISPICKVAL(Wall_Builder__c, "Billing Paused")),"Wall Builder Customer","Non Wall Builder Customer")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field tells you if the account is a Wall Builder Customer of any kind.
CustomField.label: Inapp Walls Customer Status
